advance-directive.title: Advance Directive
advance-directive.description: Ensure your medical wishes are respected when you can't communicate them. Prevent family conflicts about life support decisions.

advance-directive-revocation.title: Advance Directive Revocation
advance-directive-revocation.description: Update your medical preferences to reflect your current values. Ensure healthcare decisions align with your evolving wishes.

clinical-trial-agreement.title: Clinical Trial Agreement
clinical-trial-agreement.description: Access cutting-edge treatments while protecting your rights in medical research. Understand all risks before participating.

coaching-agreement.title: Coaching Agreement
coaching-agreement.description: Transform your life with professional coaching that delivers real results. Set clear goals and track progress effectively.

fitness-waiver.title: Fitness Waiver
fitness-waiver.description: Protect your fitness business from costly injury lawsuits. Essential legal shield for gyms, trainers, and sports facilities.

health-care-directive.title: Health Care Directive
health-care-directive.description: Guide your family through difficult medical decisions when you're unable to speak. Prevent confusion during health crises.

healthcare-power-of-attorney.title: Healthcare Power Of Attorney
healthcare-power-of-attorney.description: Protect your healthcare choices by appointing a trusted advocate. Ensure medical decisions align with your values.

hipaa-authorization-form.title: Hipaa Authorization Form
hipaa-authorization-form.description: Give loved ones access to your medical information when you need support. Essential for coordinated healthcare.

living-will.title: Living Will
living-will.description: Control your end-of-life care by documenting specific treatment preferences. Prevent unwanted medical interventions.

medical-consent.title: Medical Consent
medical-consent.description: Ensure your children receive prompt medical care in emergencies. Authorize treatment when you can't be present.

medical-consent-form.title: Medical Consent Form
medical-consent-form.description: Keep your children safe during activities by authorizing emergency medical care. Perfect for schools and camps.

medical-power-of-attorney.title: Medical Power Of Attorney
medical-power-of-attorney.description: Ensure quality healthcare decisions when you're unable to communicate. Appoint someone who understands your values.

personal-training-agreement.title: Personal Training Agreement
personal-training-agreement.description: Achieve your fitness goals with professional training that delivers results. Establish clear expectations for success.

telemedicine-agreement.title: Telemedicine Agreement
telemedicine-agreement.description: Access convenient healthcare from home with telemedicine services. Get quality medical care without travel time.
